text: Hello! I am a PhD candidate in Applied Math at the University of Waterloo (Canada), my grad work so far has been on models of ecological systems, and of course lately modelling the pandemic. I found Julia in 2019 when I was working with bifurcations in systems of SDEs and there were few good SDE solvers outside of DifferentialEquations.jl. Since then, I have rewritten all my model code in Julia. I've been around here a while already, and have met some great people so far ^_^.

elements.text: Hello! I am a PhD candidate in Applied Math at the University of Waterloo (Canada), my grad work so far has been on models of ecological systems, and of course lately modelling the pandemic. I found Julia in 2019 when I was working with bifurcations in systems of SDEs and there were few good SDE solvers outside of DifferentialEquations.jl. Since then, I have rewritten all my model code in Julia. I've been around here a while already, and have met some great people so far ^_^.

text: Hi, you might be interested in BifurcationKit.jl for bifurcation analysis

elements.text: Hi, you might be interested in BifurcationKit.jl for bifurcation analysis

text: Hi Peter! You might be interested in getting involved in EcoJulia at some stage. I also write a bunch of spatial eco modelling tools over at <https://github.com/cesaraustralia>, I would love to do some epidemiological models in DynamicGrids.jl one day.
